an3.73:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
an3.73:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā gilānā vuṭṭhito hoti aciravuṭṭhito gelaññā.
an3.73:4.4: Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an3.73:4.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho mahānāmo sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an3.73:4.7: “dīgharattāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā evaṃ dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi:
an3.73:4.9: Samādhi nu kho, bhante, pubbe, pacchā ñāṇaṃ;
an3.73:4.13: Ayañca mahānāmo sakko bhagavantaṃ atigambhīraṃ pañhaṃ pucchati.
an3.73:4.14: Yannūnāhaṃ mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ ekamantaṃ apanetvā dhammaṃ deseyyan”ti.
an3.73:5.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ bāhāyaṃ gahetvā ekamantaṃ apanetvā mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ etadavoca:
an3.73:5.2: “sekhampi kho, mahānāma, sīlaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā, asekhampi sīlaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā;
an3.73:5.3: sekhopi samādhi vutto bhagavatā, asekhopi samādhi vutto bhagavatā;
an3.73:5.4: sekhāpi paññā vuttā bhagavatā, asekhāpi paññā vuttā bhagavatā.
an3.73:5.6: Idha, mahānāma, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharati … pe …
an3.73:6.2: Idha, mahānāma, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi … pe …
an3.73:7.2: Idha, mahānāma, bhikkhu ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti … pe …
an3.73:8.1: Sa kho so, mahānāma, ariyasāvako evaṃ sīlasampanno evaṃ samādhisampanno evaṃ paññāsampanno āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an3.73:8.2: Evaṃ kho, mahānāma, sekhampi sīlaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā, asekhampi sīlaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā;
an3.73:8.3: sekhopi samādhi vutto bhagavatā, asekhopi samādhi vutto bhagavatā;
an3.73:8.4: sekhāpi paññā vuttā bhagavatā, asekhāpi paññā vuttā bhagavatā”ti.
